Posts.Content: Aug 12, 2011 09:43PM tldrose wrote: hello - im right there with ya! Ive just had my 3rd round of A/C and one more, then will have 4 rounds of Taxol. Will end chemo in late Oct. Im glad i founf this forum, because it helps to get through this. My husband and children dont understand what I'm going through and it gets lonely. I just try to keep a positive attitute about it and "never give up"!
Posts.Title: August 2011 chemo, anyone w/ me?! vtellen MizMarie

Posts.Content: Aug 17, 2011 06:59PM tldrose wrote: Hello - thanks - Im not sure how helpful I can be, but I will try. AC has been okay for me. The worst s/e has been no energy and fatigue! I have been given alot of anti-nausea pre meds and haven't had any problems with that. I did react badly to the Neulasta and told my Onc that I wanted a round without it to see what my body does and I feel much better this time. I do have to go get my CBC done tomorrow and am praying they are good so I don't need the Neulastat on the the next round! After AC next week, I will start 4 rounds of Taxol and not sure how that will be!
Posts.Title: August 2011 chemo, anyone w/ me?! vtellen MizMarie
